eventsFunctionsExtensions.name: NavMeshPathfinding
eventsFunctionsExtensions.previewIconUrl: https://resources.gdevelop-app.com/assets/Icons/Line Hero Pack/Master/SVG/Maps and Navigation/Maps and Navigation_map_find_search.svg
eventsFunctionsExtensions.shortDescription: Pathfinding allows to compute an efficient path for objects, avoiding obstacles on the way.

eventsBasedBehaviors.description: Move the object to a target in straight lines while avoiding all objects that are flagged as obstacles.
eventsBasedBehaviors.name: NavMeshPathfindingBehavior

eventsBasedBehaviors.description: Flag the object as being an obstacle for pathfinding.
eventsBasedBehaviors.fullName: Obstacle for pathfinding (polygonal mesh based, experimental)
eventsBasedBehaviors.name: NavMeshPathfindingObstacleBehavior

sharedPropertyDescriptors.label: Cell size
sharedPropertyDescriptors.description: Cell size for obstacle collision mask rasterization.
sharedPropertyDescriptors.name: CellSize

sharedPropertyDescriptors.label: Area left bound
sharedPropertyDescriptors.description: The left bound of the area where objects can go (default to the game resolution).
sharedPropertyDescriptors.name: AreaLeftBound

sharedPropertyDescriptors.label: Area top bound
sharedPropertyDescriptors.description: The top bound of the area where objects can go (default to the game resolution).
sharedPropertyDescriptors.name: AreaTopBound

sharedPropertyDescriptors.label: Area right bound
sharedPropertyDescriptors.description: The right bound of the area where objects can go (default to the game resolution).
sharedPropertyDescriptors.name: AreaRightBound

sharedPropertyDescriptors.label: Area bottom bound
sharedPropertyDescriptors.description: The bottom bound of the area where objects can go (default to the game resolution).
sharedPropertyDescriptors.name: AreaBottomBound
